name: Jarjar's Adventure
description:
This is a demo star wars fan game with humoristic purpose.

Naboo is being invaded by penguins. The Gungan army is busy fighting back near Theed palace.
You are playing Jarjar, the best warrior Naboo has ever known. 

Your goal : Kill as much penguins as possible in their home planet and collect 5 of their special cookies to make them starve to death.
